import React from 'react' import * as BooksAPI from './BooksAPI' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Select from './Select' class BookList extends React.Component { state = { books: [] } componentWillMount() { BooksAPI.getAll().then(result => this.setState({ books: result })) } updateBook = (event) => { console.log('up') BooksAPI.update(event.target.dataset.book_id, event.target.value) } componentDidUpdate() { BooksAPI.getAll().then(result => this.setState({ books: result })) } render(){ return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {this.state.books.map((book) => book.shelf === "currentlyReading" ?
  1. {book.title}
    {book.author}
    2. : "" )}

Read

    {this.state.books.map((book) => book.shelf === "read" ?
  1. {book.title}
    {book.author}
    2. : "" )}
Add a book
) } } export default BookList;
